title: 8MMM Aboriginal Radio
brief_description: A TV series based at the fictitious 8MMM Aboriginal Radio station – the three M’s standing for the three categories of whitefellas who are drawn to the place – missionaries, mercenaries and misfits.

constellations_other.name: Broadcasting marginal voices
constellations_other.description: The creation of Indigenous broadcasting in Central Australia from the late 1970s meant an array of diverse Black stories could be shared. Today, important stories told by those who physically and metaphorically live on the margins can be broadcast widely.

description: A TV series based at the fictitious 8MMM Aboriginal Radio station – the three M’s standing for the three categories of whitefellas who are drawn to the place – missionaries, mercenaries and misfits.
